howToConnect.step3: Enter the password exactly as shown

tips.title: Usage tips
tips.tip1: Print on high-quality paper for better durability
tips.tip2: Laminate the card to protect it from water
tips.tip3: Place it somewhere visible: entrance, table, fridge
tips.tip4: Print multiple copies for different locations

qrGenerator.subtitle: Create custom QR codes for your digital manual
qrGenerator.shareDescription: Create free custom QR codes for your digital manual. 100% free, no registration, unlimited downloads.
qrGenerator.urlHint: Enter any URL, text, phone number or WiFi network
qrGenerator.configurePrompt: Configure and generate your QR code
qrGenerator.downloadReady: Ready! You can now download your QR code
qrGenerator.emailSent: We've sent you an email with additional resources

tips.title: Pro tips
tips.tip1: Use short URLs for simpler, more scannable QR codes
tips.tip2: Print at minimum 3x3cm size for better readability
tips.tip3: Place the QR in visible locations near the entrance
tips.tip4: Always test the QR before printing in large quantities

tips.title: Usage tips
tips.tip1: Customize by adding or removing tasks based on your property
tips.tip2: Print and laminate for better durability

tips.tip4: Use a dry-erase marker to check tasks
